# chassisBody

**Instance Property**

The physics body representing the vehicle’s chassis.

## Declaration

```swift
var chassisBody: SCNPhysicsBody { get }
```

## Discussion

The vehicle’s chassis must be a dynamic body.

## Working with a Vehicle’s Physical Characteristics

- **wheels**: An array of [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsVehicleWheel] objects representing the vehicle’s wheels.
